text.text:
Need to broadcast in all 3 buildings:
Cafe, PDSH, Main: 
The next Remo Reset is coming soon! Stay calm and remember to refresh your browser window after a few minutes. STAY CALM! To help you STAY CALM during this transitory time, here is the remainder of our joke: ".... that doesn't come back? A stick!" We all have to agree (Yes? ... Yes!), that was worth waiting for.
